meanings.sent1: I enjoy a cup of soochong in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The soochong tea had a rich and bold flavor.
meanings.sent3: The soochong tea danced on my taste buds with delight.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of soochong filled the room, comforting and inviting.
meanings.sent5: The soochong tea leaves were as dark as a moonless night.

meanings.definition: To smoke or dry (tea leaves) over pine wood.
meanings.sent1: The tea master carefully soochonged the leaves over the fire.
meanings.sent2: She soochongs the tea leaves to enhance their flavor.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen was filled with the pleasant scent of soochonging tea leaves.
meanings.sent4: The soochonged tea leaves curled and darkened in the heat.
meanings.sent5: The art of soochonging tea leaves requires patience and skill.
